title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not immediately update in the user interface.
OB: The label height remains unchanged after modifying the font size.
EB: The label height should update accordingly when the font size is modified.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Add a label to the UI. 
2. Edit the font size of the label to be '18 points'.
